quote: I also don't believe that whatever come after life depends on my correctly reciting a list of my transgressions-that sounds too much like an Erudite afterlife to me, all accuracy and no feeling.
quote_letters: I ALSO DONT BELIEVE THAT WHATEVER COME AFTER LIFE DEPENDS ON MY CORRECTLY RECITING A LIST OF MY TRANSGRESSIONS-THAT SOUNDS TOO MUCH LIKE AN ERUDITE AFTERLIFE TO ME ALL ACCURACY AND NO FEELING
